instructions.content: Design applications for cloud environments with stateless services, horizontal scaling, and fault tolerance. Use cloud-native patterns like circuit breakers, bulkheads, and health checks.

Use Infrastructure as Code (IaC) for automated infrastructure provisioning and management. Implement tools like Terraform, CloudFormation, or Pulumi for consistent, repeatable deployments. Version control infrastructure definitions, implement proper change management processes, and ensure reproducible deployments across environments.
Implement cloud cost optimization with right-sizing, auto-scaling, reserved instances, and resource tagging. Monitor usage patterns and implement cost alerts and budgets.
Design for multi-region deployment with data replication, failover mechanisms, and disaster recovery procedures. Consider data sovereignty and latency requirements.
